amendment.description: To provide for a total of $950,000,000 in outlays for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program in fiscal year 2009.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4225 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S2064-2067; text: CR S2066) To provide for a total of $950,000,000 in outlays for the State Criminal Alien Assistance Program in fiscal year 2009.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4225 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Feinstein.
